1.content:
Another long day, with nothing to do. Hiro, a young male trainer, looked off into the horizon. He was sitting on the beach on Ula'ula Island, just sitting on a towel.

Suddenly, he became aware of a Pokemon standing beside him.
1.title: A Very Unfortunate Trainer

11.content: It was a Gardevoir! She was staring down at Hiro, almost with no expression. Hiro slowly gets up, not sure what to do as she kept her eyes on him. Then, her arm grabs onto his arm, as they suddenly teleport in the middle of the woods. Before Hiro could think, a loud stomach growl was heard from Gardevoir's stomach.
11.title: Gardevoir

111.content:
Hiro stood still and try to keep his cool, listening to the sounds of Gardevoir's stomach. She places a hand on her belly and closes her eyes. Suddenly, a loud fart came out of her, as her dress blew up from the wind she passed. The smell was awful, as Hiro holds his nose.

The Gardevoir couldn't help but to give a smirk as she then lets out another loud gas, leaving Hiro to fan the air. Then, all of a sudden, she pushes him down to the ground. Hiro looks up at Gardevoir, smirking down at him.
111.title: Stand still

1111.content: Hiro tries to get back up, but Gardevoir uses her Psychic to hold him down. She turns around, then sat down on Hiro's face! Hiro couldn't believe what was going on, as he struggles for her to get off. However, she wasn't going to give off of him anytime soon as her stomach growls again.
1111.title: Try to get up

11111.content: Gardevoir closes her eyes again as she let rip a loud, brassy fart in Hiro's face. The smell was way worse near her butt, even with her dress covering it, as he groans in disgust and tries once again for her to get off. However, he was getting more farts blasted in his face as he coughs and gags a bit. The smell was growing strong as Gardevoir sighs in relief. She wasn't done yet, as her stomach growls again, much louder than before.
11111.title: Face full of Farts

111111.content:
Gardevoir stood up, but makes sure Hiro doesn't get up, as he looks up at her. She smirks at him again, as she lifts her dress up. Hiro then gets a good view of the Pokémon's butt, and sees it was in fact female. Gardevoir then squats down over Hiro, to his horror as he hears her letting out a small grunt and seeing a log poking out of her anus. It starts sliding down until the huge load drops onto Hiro's face! As it dropped, she grunts again, as she lets out wet, sloppy farts onto Hiro. He then gets a face full of sloppy shit raining down on him.

Gardevoir lets out soft moans as she lets out mushy crap all over Hiro's head. He was getting buried in her Pokeshit as he looks up at her anus. She lets out some more soft logs on Hiro, before letting out a very wet shart. She lets out a sigh of relief as she stood back up. Hiro, then looks up at her, after getting a bit of shit off him, as she winks at him before teleporting away, leaving him covered in shit in the middle of the woods
111111.title: Gardevoir uses Muddy Water

112.content:
Hiro, knowing the sound of her stomach, makes a dash for it. However, he is stopped by her Physic move as she walks towards him. She turns around in front of him, lifting her dress up as her physic power putt his face between her butt. She then lets out some grunts before letting out a really loud, brassy fart on his face. He coughs as the smell gets to him and passes out.

Gardevoir lets him go, as he drops down on the ground, as was knocked out from the gas.
112.title: Try to run away

121.content: When Hiro looked over, his eyes landed upon a small, fluffy Eevee, standing just at his side. It was pretty strange to see a wild Eevee come so close to a human, even stranger was the brown Pokémon’s fascination with the human. It stared directly at him, doing nothing, almost like it was thinking about something. However, Hiro didn’t have much time to think about the Eevee himself, because the fuzzy Pokémon suddenly pounced on the trainer. Hiro was taken by surprise, and fell over onto his back. Now that the Eevee was in Hiro’s face, he noticed that the Eevee had a mischievous glint in its eyes...
121.title: Eevee

122.content:
Well, alright. Which generation?

Generation I: Flareon, Vaporeon, and Jolteon

Generation II: Umbreon and Espeon

Generation IV & VI: Glaceon, Leafeon and Sylveon
122.title: One of the Eeveelutions!

1221.content: Do you want the fluffy fire-type, Flareon? The scaly water-type, Vaporeon? Or the spiky electric-type, Jolteon?
1221.title: The Original Eeveelutions!

1222.content: Do you want the edgy dark-type, Umbreon? Or the mysterious psychic-type, Espeon?
1222.title: The Original Pokemon Sun & Moon

1223.content: Do you want the cold ice-type, Glaceon? The verdant grass-type, Leafeon? Or the elegant fairy-type, Sylveon?
1223.title: The Newer Eeveelutions

13.content: Will it be male, or female?
13.title: Absol

131.content:
Looking away from the horizon, Hiro looked at the Pokemon beside him. It was an Absol! Judging by the lack of other trainers nearby, he assumed it was wild, as well.

"Well, aren't you quite a distance from your habitat... are you lost?"

The Absol smiled at him, before suddenly tackling him to the ground. Before the poor trainer could even react, the Absol turned around, and plopped his ass right on Hiro's face.
131.title: Disaster Strikes!

15.content: How about some of the more popular Pokemon?
15.title: The Usual Suspects

151.content: "Have a safe trip home!" A female voice says to Hiro. You smile at her and walk out of the Pokémon Center excited to continue your adventure. Just then, you catch a glimpse of something blue in your vision. You recognize him then by the unmistakable size of hive butt. A big Lucario is walking in the woods just a few feet away from you. Covered by the trees, you feel he hasn't seen you yet.
151.title: Lucario

1511.content:
Lucario notices you. He turns around and lets out a powerful fart.
PBBBBRRRAAAPTT!
The air becomes immediately warming as the overpowering stench fills your nose. Lucario uses paw, which glows bright blue with his aura, to manipulate you and bring you closer to his big, gassy rump.
1511.title: Approach the Lucario.

15111.content:
"Oh, I'm so glad you like my gassy rump~" *Lucario smiles as he wraps his arms around you, forcing you to smell his gas.. Then Lucario cocks a hip, and lets out a bubbly fart*
**PRRBBBTT!**
"Oh my apologies, that last bit of aura I used just need to find an escape to come out."
15111.title: Accept Lucario's farts

15112.content:
"Hello there Hiro, I've been watching you~" the Lucario says smiling and looking up at you. Then suddenly, he gets on his feet. The Lucario, being quite a bit taller than you, easily squats over you to let out a loud, rumbling fart from his blue butt.
**PRRBBBBTTT!**
"So Hiro, how do you like my farts?" *He says chuckling and slowly starting to enjoy himself on you*
15112.title: Fight it

1512.content:
PRRROOOOTTT!
You can hear a bassy fart noise in the distance, like a tuba being played, and you hear a Lucario giggling to himself.
Lucario just let rip one of the most powerful farts you have ever heard. The smell hits your nose immediately, forcing you to unintentionally gag, and it appears he has noticed you.
1512.title: Try to Run away

choices: Beg him to let you out from under his rump
15122.content:
"Hello there Hiro, I've been watching you~" the Lucario says smiling and looking up at you. Then suddenly, he gets on his feet. The Lucario, being quite a bit taller than you, easily squats over you to let out a loud, rumbling fart from his blue butt.
**PRRBBBBTTT!**
"So Hiro, how do you like my farts?" *He says chuckling and slowly starting to enjoy himself on you*
15122.title: Give up and approach Lucario.

155.content: Alright, how about we do some categories?
155.title: Still Other

1551.content: Alright! These are the Pokemon you get to choose from at the start of the game!
1551.title: Starter Pokemon!

1552.content:
Legendary Pokemon are special Pokemon that you can usually only get one of in a single save file. They are usually immensely powerful!

Mythical Pokemon are even more rare than Legendaries, usually being unattainable in the core games. You can only get them from real world events!
1552.title: Legendaries & Mythicals

15521.content: Do you want the mysterious birds, known as the Mirages? Or the artificial clone, Mewtwo?
15521.title: Generation I Legendaries!

155211.content: Do you want the icy Articuno? The shocking Zapdos? Or the flaming Moltres?
155211.title: The Mirages (Articuno, Zapdos, Moltres)

155213.content: Do you want the Beasts, or the Tower Duo?
155213.title: Generation II Legendaries!

1552133.content:
Generation III has:
- the Titans
- the Eon Duo
- the Weather Trio

Generation IV has:
- the Lake Guardians
- the Creation Trio
- various random legendaries

155213333.content:
Generation VII has:

155213333.title: Still Other Other Other Legendaries!

info.brief_description: The Official Interactive by the creator of the Gassydex!
info.description:
Welcome to the Gassydex, but as an interactive! You can find the original here:
https://www.furaffinity.net/gallery/darktype/folder/667967/The-Gassydex/

Basically, this is a story about a poor trainer, Hiro, who is unceremoniously used as a fart cushion for various Pokemon, and sometimes as something more.

Rules:
1) The main character is Hiro Trebuchet, a male trainer in his early 20s. Do not change this.
2) The Pokemon may be any gender, but sex in any capacity is not allowed.
3) Farting, shitting, and pissing are all okay.
4) No killing Hiro.
5) No humans being the ones gassing or shitting or whatever on Hiro.

I'm curious to see how this goes. Who knows, I might even use ideas and such from this in the official entries! I look forward to seeing what you create!
